mapper.select: SELECT f.memId, m.memNickname, f.title, f.content, f.createdDate, f.uploadImage, f.boardCtgId, f.recordNo, f.views FROM myFishRecords f JOIN member m ON f.memId = m.memId ORDER BY f.createdDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO myFishRecords (memId, boardCtgId, title, content, uploadImage, fishName, fishSize, equipment, location, weather, createdDate) VALUES (#{memId}, #{boardCtgId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{uploadImage}, #{fishName}, #{fishSize}, #{equipment}, #{location}, #{weather}, #{createdDate})
mapper.select: SELECT f.recordNo, f.memId, f.boardCtgId, f.title, f.createdDate, f.content, f.uploadImage, f.fishName, f.fishSize, f.equipment, f.location, f.weather, m.memNickname, f.views FROM myFishRecords f JOIN member m ON f.memId = m.memId WHERE f.recordNo = #{recordNo};

SELECT f.memId, m.memNickname, f.title, f.content, f.createdDate, f.uploadImage, f.boardCtgId, f.recordNo, f.views FROM myFishRecords f JOIN member m ON f.memId = m.memId WHERE f.memId = #{memId} ORDER BY f.recordNo DESC
